Package database.dao

Class UserDatabase

java.lang.Object
database.dao.UserDatabase
public class UserDatabase extends Object
Wraps raw SQL connections to the user table in a more accessible API
Version:
- June 1st 2023
Author:
Tommy Shan

      public UserDatabase() throws SQLException
      Constructs the object and initializes its data. Creates a users table if it does not exist
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while using SQL

      Returns:
      the user with the specified id or null if not found

      Returns:
      the found user or null if not found

    • updatePoints

      public void updatePoints(int userId, int newPoints) throws SQLException
      updatePoints Attempts to update the points that a user has
      Parameters:
      userId - the username to search for
      newPoints - the new amount of points the user has
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while using SQL

    • authenticate

      public User authenticate(String username, String hashedPassword)
      authenticate Attempts to authenticate the user with the specified credentials and returns the current user
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      hashedPassword - the hashed and salted password of the user
      Returns:
      the current user if the credentials are valid or null if no user is found or the credentials are invalid

    • login

      public User login(String username, String password)
      login Attempts to log in the user with the specified username and plaintext password. It computes the hash of the passwords with the username's salt and checks for a match.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      password - the plaintext password of the user
      Returns:
      the requested user if the credentials are valid or null if no user is found or the credentials are invalid

    • getCurrentUserFromRequest

      public User getCurrentUserFromRequest(Request req)
      getCurrentUser Gets the current user with information from a Request
      Parameters:
      req - the request with user authentication information
      Returns:
      the current User or null if there is no user logged in

    • createAdminUser

      public void createAdminUser(String username, String password) throws SQLException
      createAdminUser Creates an admin user with a username and password. All problems on the judge may to attributed to this user
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the admin
      password - the plaintext password of the admin
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while using SQLows

    • getSalt

      public static byte[] getSalt()
      getSalt Creates a secure random salt as bytes.
      Returns:
      the salt as an array of bytes

    • hashPassword

      public static String hashPassword(String password, byte[] salt)
      hashPassword Hashes a plaintext password with a given salt
      Parameters:
      password - the plaintext password to compute the hash for
      salt - the salt to compute the hash with
      Returns:
      the hashed password
